sen.e: The order of the qualifications to apply for the post was as follows: "Hikurodo (trainee in the Kurodo dokoro, or the Imperial Secretariat) who was a son of a court noble," "Hikurodo," "Shippei koto (vassals of Sekke (line of regents and advisers))," "major posts of Inshi (offices for retired emperor or empress)," " Zoshiki (low-level functionary), "Jusei (Confucian scholars) who passed difficult tests, such as Myobodo (study of Codes)," and "hogandai (an administrative official of the Retired-Emperor's Office)" and "hogandai (an administrative official of the Retired-Emperor's Office)."
